name: Pumpkin Cinnamon Swirl Bread - Yeast Sandwich Bread
description: Pumpkin Cinnamon Swirl Bread! Pumpkin Sandwich bread with a swirl of cinnamon and sugar. Yeasted Loaf. Makes great french Toasts. Vegan Breakfast Recipe. Makes 1 8.5 by 4.5 loaf. You can also use 9 by 5 loaf pan
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
1 cup unbleached white flour (or ap flour)
2 cups flour (I use 1 cup whole wheat and 1 cup unbleached white)
2  + tbsp coconut sugar or brown sugar
1 tsp pumpkin pie spice or cinnamon

itemListElement.text: In the mixer bowl, add warm hot non dairy milk,, pumpkin puree, sugar, oil, and pumpkin pie spice and mix. Add flour and yeast and mix in until well combined, about 1-2 mins. Let this sponge sit for 45 minutes in a warm place.
itemListElement.name: In the mixer bowl, add warm hot non dairy milk,, pumpkin puree, sugar, oil, and pumpkin pie spice and mix. Add flour and yeast and mix in until well combined, about 1-2 mins. Let this sponge sit for 45 minutes in a warm place.

itemListElement.text: Mix the salt into the 2 cups flour. Add 1 3/4 cup flour (from the 2 cups) to the sponge and knead. Add more flour or water if needed to make a smooth non sticky dough. Knead for 3 to 4 minutes in stand mixer or 6 to 7 minutes by hand.
itemListElement.name: Mix the salt into the 2 cups flour. Add 1 3/4 cup flour (from the 2 cups) to the sponge and knead. Add more flour or water if needed to make a smooth non sticky dough. Knead for 3 to 4 minutes in stand mixer or 6 to 7 minutes by hand.

itemListElement.text: Using some flour flour, roll it out into 10 by 17-18 inch rectangle.
itemListElement.name: Using some flour flour, roll it out into 10 by 17-18 inch rectangle.

itemListElement.text: Spray or brush oil on the rectangle.
itemListElement.name: Spray or brush oil on the rectangle.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle the cinnamon sugar mixture all over leaving an inch on the sides. Spray water lightly on top.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle the cinnamon sugar mixture all over leaving an inch on the sides. Spray water lightly on top.

itemListElement.text: Roll the rectangle along the 10 inch side. Seal the edge using some water. Fold the side edges under to make a roll that fits the loaf pan (see step pictures). Place in parchment lined loaf pan. Spray water on the roll. Sprinkle seeds or oats. Cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place for 40 minutes or until doubled.
itemListElement.name: Roll the rectangle along the 10 inch side. Seal the edge using some water. Fold the side edges under to make a roll that fits the loaf pan (see step pictures). Place in parchment lined loaf pan. Spray water on the roll. Sprinkle seeds or oats. Cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place for 40 minutes or until doubled.

itemListElement.text: Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Cool for 10 minutes then remove from the pan. Cool completely before slicing. Slice with a serrated knife. Serve warmed, lightly toasted with vegan butter + sugar/maple or make french toasts.
itemListElement.name: Cool for 10 minutes then remove from the pan. Cool completely before slicing. Slice with a serrated knife. Serve warmed, lightly toasted with vegan butter + sugar/maple or make french toasts.

itemListElement.text: Store on the counter in bread container for the day. Refrigerate for upto 4 days.
itemListElement.name: Store on the counter in bread container for the day. Refrigerate for upto 4 days.
